revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: In reply to your letter of the 30th ultimo, I have to inform you that your account for services rendered on behalf of the United States before the Surveyor General of California, touching Swamp and Overflowed lands, &c., was approved by the Attorney General on the 3d instant, of which approval I advised you on the same date.
